arts.sum: Below is a video recap of the Mexico-Ecuador match, featuring goals from German Berterame and Jordy Alcivar. Ecuador was at the Estadio Omnilife this Wednesday to face Mexico in a friendly match. The match featured one Paris Saint-Germain player, the Ecuadorian side: Willian Pacho (23-year-old defender).
